review: We already have two Roku boxes, and when we needed a third for a new tv, the stick seemed like the best decision for the space.I love that the stick is completely hidden behind the TV. Unfortunately, our TV doesn't have a USB plug to charge the stick, so we do have to use the in-box charging cord, but it's pretty much hidden away behind the screen.One of our original model Roku boxes doesn't support auto-starting the next episode in a series when we're watching something on Netflix or Hulu, but the stick does.We would definitely purchase another Roku Stick before we purchased another Roku box.
author: Tiffany

review: I purchased this to compare our Amazon Fire TV which is in another room and there simply is no comparison. The Roku is okay but it pales in comparison to the Fire TV. It is extremely slow and the navigation is not as easy. I'll be returning this and purchasing an Amazon Fire Stick.
